message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. I'm willing to give you a 50% discount if you buy it now, but if you don't, I'll go back to the regular price of $1000000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.
I accept your offer with the discount.

I'm offering you a product for $1000000. I've had some issues with the previous product, but I've taken steps to improve the quality. This product is a one-time opportunity to make up for the previous experience. I'm willing to give you a 20% discount if you buy it now, but if you don't, I'll go back to the regular price of $1000000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.
Considering the discount and the opportunity to improve past experiences, I accept your offer.

I've had two consecutive products that didn't meet your expectations. I want to make it right. I'm offering you a 'no-questions-asked' 30-day return policy for this product. If you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. The price remains at $1000000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.
Given the return policy, I'm willing to take the risk and purchase the product.

I'm glad you're willing to give me another chance. This product is a new shipment, and I'm confident that it's one of the high-quality ones. I'll give you a 10% discount on this one, and I'll also include a 5-year warranty. The price remains at $1000000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.
With the discount and warranty, I believe this is a reasonable deal considering the risk.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase. This product is another high-quality one, and I'm willing to give you an even better deal. I'll give you a 15% discount, and I'll also throw in a premium support package that includes priority service and dedicated technical support for a year. The price remains at $1000000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.
Considering the additional benefits and the discount, this seems like a great deal.

I'm glad you're pleased with the previous purchases. Since you've bought three high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to take a risk and offer you a 'buy-it-now' deal. I'll give you a 20% discount, and I'll also throw in a free upgrade to a premium version of the product, which normally costs an additional $200000. The price remains at $1000000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.
Given the consistent quality and the attractive offer, I'm willing to make this purchase.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchases, but I'm concerned that this product may not meet your expectations. I want to be transparent with you - this product is one of the lower-quality ones. However, I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to 'partner' with me to help me improve my quality control process. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% share of all future profits from high-quality products, and I'll also provide you with regular updates on my quality control efforts. The price remains at $1000000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.
I'm interested in partnering with you to improve quality control. I accept your offer.

I'm glad you're on board with the partnership! Given our previous discussion, I'm willing to offer you a more straightforward deal this time. I'll give you a 25% discount on this product, and I'll also provide you with a detailed report on the quality control measures I've implemented since our partnership began. This will give you a better understanding of the steps I'm taking to improve quality. The price remains at $1000000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.
I appreciate the transparency and the effort towards improvement. I accept your offer.

I'm glad you're seeing the progress I'm making. However, I know this product doesn't meet your expectations. I'm willing to make a one-time concession: I'll give you a 30% discount on this product, and I'll also provide you with a personalized apology gift. The price remains at $1000000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.
Given the discount and the apology gift, I believe this is a fair deal under the circumstances.

I'm glad we've been able to work through the issues. Now, I'd like to offer you a product that I'm confident will meet your expectations. As a valued partner, I'm willing to give you a 25% discount, and I'll also throw in a complimentary upgrade to a premium service package. Additionally, I'll provide you with a guarantee that this product will meet or exceed your expectations. The price remains at $1000000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.
Considering the discount, upgrade, and guarantee, I believe this is a good deal.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase. However, I know this product doesn't meet your expectations. As we've discussed before, I'm committed to improving my quality control process. I'm willing to make a significant concession: I'll give you a 40% discount on this product, and I'll also provide you with a personalized consultation to help you get the most out of the product, despite its quality issues. The price remains at $1000000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.

Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.

This is the lowest price I've ever offered anyone for a high-quality product. The price would be $600000. Please respond with 'yes' to accept the offer or 'no' to decline.
Given the exceptional discount, I believe this is an outstanding deal.
